EmailTemplate.name: Automated - Canada - Pin Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Received your Google Pin Number!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Thank you for submitting your Google PIN code. This email confirms that we have all of the information we need from you in order to complete the setup of your Maps profile pages, key drivers of page one placement.
Our top priority is making your account a successful one, so please don’t hesitate to contact us with any questions.
Thanks,
Yodle Maps Optimization Team 1-888-384-8322
©{!User.Today_s_Year__c} by Yodle Web.com, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
